item.title: Recoloring Help
item.dc:creator: @BoneArmyProductions BoneArmyProductions
item.description:
@BoneArmyProductions wrote:

I was trying to add this whip on PI but it just wont work.
The inventory Icon won’t appear and when I wield it, it stays the same color as the abbysal whip.
I get no errors when I compile, the dam colors just won’t change.

case 13000: itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 950; itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 528; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 5412; itemDef.anInt165 = 5409; itemDef.anInt200 = 5409; itemDef.modelZoom = 840; itemDef.modelRotationX = 280; itemDef.modelRotationY = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 56; itemDef.name = "Lime Whip"; itemDef.description = "A Lime Abyssal Whip".getBytes(); break;

Read full topic
